scripts.build_mac: npm run build & npm run copy
scripts.build_windows: npm run build & npm run remove_wind & npm run copy_wind
scripts.copy: rm -rf ../app/static/css && rm -rf ../app/static/js && rm -rf ../app/static/media && rm -f ../app/static/manifest.json && rm -f ../app/templates/index.html && cp -r build/static/* ../app/static/ && cp build/manifest.json ../app/static/ && cp build/index.html ../app/templates/
scripts.copy_wind: xcopy /s .\build\static\* ..\app\static\ && xcopy /s build\manifest.json ..\app\static\ && xcopy /s build\index.html ..\app\templates\ && xcopy /s build\operator.png ..\app\static\
